00035 /*
00036  When processing split archives, this value is passes as the argument to the CZipCallback::Callback method
00037  to notify that the current volume is the last one.
00038 */
00039 #define ZIP_SPLIT_LAST_VOLUME (ZIP_SIZE_TYPE)(-1)

00153 struct ZIP_API CZipActionCallback : public CZipCallback
00154 {  
00155  friend class CZipArchive;
00156  friend class CZipCentralDir;
00157 
00168  enum CallbackType
00169  {
00174   cbNothing  = 0x0000,
00175 
00180   cbAdd   = 0x0001,
00181 
00188   cbAddTmp  = 0x0002,
00189 
00197   cbAddStore  = 0x0004, 
00198 
00203   cbExtract  = 0x0008,
00204 
00211   cbDeleteCnt  = 0x0010,
00212 
00218   cbDelete  = 0x0020,
00219 
00224   cbTest   = 0x0040,
00225 
00232   cbSave   = 0x0080,
00233 
00238   cbGet   = 0x0100,
00239 
00245   cbModify  = 0x0200,
00246 
00252   cbMoveData  = 0x0400,
00253 
00260   cbCalculateForMulti= 0x0800,
00261   
00269   cbMultiAdd  = 0x1000 | cbAdd,
00270 
00271   
00278   cbEncryptPrepare= 0x2000,
00279 
00286   cbEncryptMoveData= 0x4000,
00287 
00294   cbEncrypt  = 0x8000,
00295 
00296 
00305   cbMultiEncrypt = 0x10000 | cbEncryptMoveData | cbEncrypt,
00306 
00312   cbNextValue  = 0x20000,
00313   
00319   cbSubActions = cbAddTmp | cbAddStore | cbDeleteCnt | cbMoveData | cbCalculateForMulti | cbEncryptPrepare | cbEncryptMoveData,
00320 
00325   cbActions  = cbAdd | cbExtract | cbDelete | cbTest | cbSave | cbGet | cbModify | cbEncrypt,
00326 
00332   cbMultiActions = cbMultiAdd | cbMultiEncrypt,
00333 
00338   cbAll   = cbActions | cbSubActions | cbMultiActions
00339  };

00350  struct ZIP_API CMultiActionsInfo
00351  {
00352   friend struct CZipActionCallback;
00353 
00354   ZIP_SIZE_TYPE m_uTotalBytesToProcess; 
00355   ZIP_SIZE_TYPE m_uTotalFilesToProcess; 
00356   ZIP_SIZE_TYPE m_uBytesProcessed;  
00357   ZIP_SIZE_TYPE m_uFilesProcessed;  
00358 
00364   ZIP_SIZE_TYPE LeftFilesToProcess() const {return m_uTotalFilesToProcess - m_uFilesProcessed;}
00365 
00371   ZIP_SIZE_TYPE LeftBytesToProcess() const {return m_uTotalBytesToProcess - m_uBytesProcessed;}  
00372  private:
00373   void Init(ZIP_SIZE_TYPE uTotalItemsToProcess, ZIP_SIZE_TYPE uTotalBytesToProcess, int iReactType)
00374   {
00375    m_uTotalFilesToProcess = uTotalItemsToProcess;
00376    m_uTotalBytesToProcess = uTotalBytesToProcess;
00377    m_uBytesProcessed = m_uFilesProcessed = 0;
00378    m_iReactType = iReactType;
00379    m_bActive = false;
00380   }
00381   void OnCallbackInit(int iType)
00382   {
00383    // this assumes, that the callback type will stay unchanged 
00384    // between Init() and CallbackEnd()
00385    m_bActive = iType == m_iReactType;
00386   }
00387 
00388   void OnCallCallback(ZIP_SIZE_TYPE uProgress)
00389   {
00390    if (m_bActive)
00391     m_uBytesProcessed += uProgress;
00392   }
00393   bool OnNextFile()
00394   {
00395    if (m_bActive)
00396    {
00397     m_uFilesProcessed++;
00398     return true;
00399    }
00400    else
00401     return false;
00402   }
00403   bool m_bActive;  
00404   int m_iReactType;
00405  };
00406 
00407  CZipActionCallback()
00408  {  
00409   m_uTotalToProcess = 0;
00410   m_uProcessed = 0;
00411   m_pMultiActionsInfo = NULL;
00412  }
00413 
00435  virtual void MultiActionsInit(ZIP_SIZE_TYPE uTotalFilesToProcess, ZIP_SIZE_TYPE uTotalBytesToProcess, int iReactType)
00436  {
00437   InitMultiActionsInfo();
00438   m_pMultiActionsInfo->Init(uTotalFilesToProcess, uTotalBytesToProcess, iReactType);
00439  }
00440  
00452  virtual void Init(LPCTSTR lpszFileInZip = NULL, LPCTSTR lpszExternalFile = NULL) 
00453  {
00454   m_szFileInZip = lpszFileInZip;
00455   m_szExternalFile = lpszExternalFile;
00456   m_uTotalToProcess = 0;  // not yet known
00457   m_uProcessed = 0; // nothing yet done
00458   CacheStepSize();  
00459   ResetProgressStage();
00460   if (m_pMultiActionsInfo)
00461    // the type is known now
00462    m_pMultiActionsInfo->OnCallbackInit(m_iType);
00463  }
00464 
00471  virtual void SetTotal(ZIP_SIZE_TYPE uTotalToDo)
00472  {
00473   m_uTotalToProcess = uTotalToDo;
00474 //   m_uProcessed = 0; // already done in CZipCallbackProvider::Get
00475  } 
00476 
00490  virtual bool MultiActionsNext()
00491  {
00492   if (m_pMultiActionsInfo && m_pMultiActionsInfo->OnNextFile())
00493    return Callback(0);
00494   else
00495    return true;
00496  }
00497 
00503  virtual void CallbackEnd()
00504  {
00505   //ASSERT(m_uProcessed == m_uTotalToProcess);  
00506  };
00507  
00518  virtual void MultiActionsEnd()
00519  {
00520   ReleaseMultiActionsInfo();
00521  }
00522 
00529  ZIP_SIZE_TYPE LeftToProcess() const {return m_uTotalToProcess - m_uProcessed;}
00530 
00543  ZIP_SIZE_TYPE m_uTotalToProcess;    
00544  ZIP_SIZE_TYPE m_uProcessed; 
00545  CZipString m_szFileInZip;  
00546 
00551  int m_iType;
00552 
00563  CMultiActionsInfo* GetMultiActionsInfo()
00564  {
00565   return m_pMultiActionsInfo;
00566  }
00567 
00574  void SetReactType(int iType)
00575  {
00576   m_pMultiActionsInfo->m_iReactType = iType;
00577  }
00578 
00597  virtual int GetStepSize()
00598  {
00599   return m_iType == cbSave || m_iType == cbDeleteCnt || m_iType == cbCalculateForMulti || m_iType == cbEncryptPrepare ? 256 : 1;
00600  }
00601 
00602  ~CZipActionCallback()
00603  {
00604   ReleaseMultiActionsInfo();
00605  }
00606 
00617  bool RequestCallback(ZIP_SIZE_TYPE uProgress = 1)
00618  {
00619   if (!uProgress)
00620    return true;
00621   if (m_iCachedStepSize == 1)
00622    return CallCallback(uProgress);
00623   else
00624   {
00625    m_uAccumulatedProgress += uProgress;  
00626    if (m_iCurrentStep >= m_iCachedStepSize)
00627    {
00628     bool ret = CallCallback(m_uAccumulatedProgress);
00629     ResetProgressStage();
00630     return ret;
00631    }
00632    else
00633    {
00634     m_iCurrentStep++;
00635     return true;
00636    }
00637   }
00638  }
00639 
00653  bool RequestLastCallback(ZIP_SIZE_TYPE uProgress = 0)
00654  {
00655   bool ret;
00656   if (m_uAccumulatedProgress == 0 && uProgress == 0)
00657    ret = true;
00658   else
00659    ret = CallCallback(m_uAccumulatedProgress + uProgress);
00660   ResetProgressStage();
00661   return ret;
00662  }
00663 
00664 protected: 
00676  virtual bool CallCallback(ZIP_SIZE_TYPE uProgress)
00677  {
00678   m_uProcessed += uProgress;
00679   if (m_pMultiActionsInfo)
00680    m_pMultiActionsInfo->OnCallCallback(uProgress);
00681   return Callback(uProgress);
00682  }
00683 
00687  void CacheStepSize()
00688  {
00689   m_iCachedStepSize = GetStepSize();
00690   if (m_iCachedStepSize == 0)
00691    m_iCachedStepSize = 1;
00692  }
00693 
00701  void ResetProgressStage()
00702  {
00703   m_iCurrentStep = 1;
00704   m_uAccumulatedProgress = 0;
00705  }
00706 private:
00707  CMultiActionsInfo* m_pMultiActionsInfo;
00708  void InitMultiActionsInfo()
00709  {
00710   ReleaseMultiActionsInfo();
00711   m_pMultiActionsInfo = new CMultiActionsInfo();
00712  }
00713  void ReleaseMultiActionsInfo()
00714  {
00715   if (m_pMultiActionsInfo != NULL)
00716   {
00717    delete m_pMultiActionsInfo;
00718    m_pMultiActionsInfo = NULL;
00719   }
00720  }
00721 
00722  int m_iCachedStepSize; 
00723  int m_iCurrentStep;
00724  ZIP_SIZE_TYPE m_uAccumulatedProgress;
00725 };
